title: Is there any procedure of filling registration form from IGNOU in an offline mode? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, you can register yourself through offline mode. I myself had registered for B.com(A&F) through offline mode only because this course was not available for online registration.(I registered myself in Dec 2016. I don't think things would have chaged much in 4–5 months) Contact the IGNOU branch near you, they will provide you with the registration forms and prospectus. Fill the form, attach the demand draft of the required amount and submit it at the branch office near you.
As far as my knowledge id concerned, they have scrapped off offline registration mode for PG courses from the January 2017 session. There is only online mode now.
